author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Upon Germanys PMI, swift and cruel,
Euro fell, made a weary fool.
A ghost of its might, meek and frail,
Like watered wine in an old, cracked pail.

Oil doth wane in Europe's grip,
Economic worries cause a slip.
Like cellar ale, left uncorked,
Its strength is spent, its promise forked.

German businesses, in decline they dwell,
In contraction's pit, a dismal hell.
A tavern closed, its merry song gone,
Echoes of laughter, growth withdrawn.

feedItems.title: Euro Falls After Weak German PMI Data
feedItems.description: EUR/USD fell to a two-month low of 1.0814 after provisional purchasing managers’ surveys for Germany showed activity contracting, with services unexpectedly weak.

feedItems.title: Oil Weakens on Economic Worries
feedItems.description: Oil prices weakened in Europe as they faced headwinds from stronger supplies and concerns about a challenging macroeconomic backdrop.

feedItems.title: German Business Activity Sinks Deeper into Contraction
feedItems.description: The Germany Composite PMI fell to 44.7 in August, its steepest decline in more than three years, as the country’s key manufacturing sector continued to struggle.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Once the dollar's urge doth recede,
Metal rises high, follows nature's creed.
Goats to the trough, as market's decree,
In China's grasp, base metal’s decree.

In Zimbabwe's fields, cast the hare,
In election's cloak, wearied despair.
Four decades of dogs, their rule imbued,
In fearsome grip, the rabbit pursued.

Nvidia emerges, a lively pup,
Investors place bets, the stakes mount up.
In earnings' race, a snail's pace preferred,
But wildfire rally, has been inferred.

feedItems.title: Metals Inch Higher as Dollar Pressure Recedes
feedItems.description: Base metals and gold prices were higher in early London trading, with Standard Chartered saying price action in base metals markets continued to be in thrall of macro drivers, risk appetite, U.S. dollar moves and China macro data flow.

feedItems.title: Disappointment, Fear Cloud Zimbabwe Election
feedItems.description: Zimbabweans cast their ballots in an election clouded by years of dizzyingly high inflation as well as intimidation from a ruling party that has been in power for more than four decades.

feedItems.title: Is Nvidia the New Tesla? Options Traders Place Their Bets
feedItems.description: Investors are wagering that the furious rally in Nvidia shares will continue after Wednesday’s earnings report.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
From Gaul's heart, a whispering bond's pledge yields fall,
Pure silver data, cloves Provision's courtly call.
Unexpected grace, albeit a lesser light,
Market's tender ballad, sings contraction's quiet night.

In Hollywood's great court, scribes in striking feud,
Youthful offers cloak'd in public's gaze renewed.
Promises of time, a check on AI's thirst,
And golden wage, to quench pen's noblest burst.

Sasol's tale of grandeur, turns to sorrow's year,
Profits fell like rain, dividends disappear.
Impairments etch'd in ledgers, pains to align,
A minstrel's lament for ZAR66 billionth time.

feedItems.title: French Government Bond Yields Fall After Provisional PMI Data
feedItems.description: French government bond yields extended falls after the provisional PMI for France came in slightly better than expected, albeit still showing activity in contractionary territory.

feedItems.title: Hollywood Studios Make Public Their Latest Offer to Striking Writers
feedItems.description: Among the concessions the studios said they offered are a guaranteed minimum length of employment, controls around the use of generative AI and wage increases.

feedItems.title: Sasol Cuts Dividend After Profit Falls
feedItems.description: Sasol reported adjusted underlying earnings for the year of ZAR66 billion, in line with its guided range, but cut its dividend after net profit came in sharply lower due to booking a number of impairments.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Hearken, in far Bharat's land, a tale of steel and silicon,
Sensex stays, as flat as shield, the ravens find no carrion.
In smithy's heat and runes of tech, strength finds their veneration,
To counteract the faltering wheels, and lenders' tribulation.

Goldman, the newcomer, strove to join the merchant's guild,
In the credit's fickle realm, it hoped its vaults to build.
But lo! As autumn leaves do fall, so did their aspiration,
Proven they, as brittle as ice, against the consumer nation.

The last account, the titans' end, going the way of Asgard,
Wall Street dreams, once strong as Thor, now in discord.
Their golden hoard, once thought secure, on China's shores they parlay,
But like the helm in storm's midst, they're tossed in disarray.

feedItems.title: India's Sensex Flat, Supported by Industrial, Tech Stocks
feedItems.description: India’s benchmark Sensex was flat at 65217.79 as gains in industrial and tech stocks help offset losses in auto and financial stocks.

feedItems.title: How Goldman Sachs Fumbled Its Consumer Business
feedItems.description: When Goldman Sachs entered the credit card space in 2019, many consumer banks were concerned that a new competitor had emerged. But just four years later, the firm is pulling back. We explain why.

feedItems.title: Wall Street's China Dreams Slip Away
feedItems.description: U.S. banks and asset managers are struggling to expand their businesses while tensions with China escalate.
